name: 陳立憲
objective:
使同學瞭解土壤之基本物理性質、土壤分類及土壤之力學行為。課程內容為土壤成因、土壤基本物理性質、阿太堡限度及粒徑分析、土壤分類、土壤滲透及及滲流、土壤之壓縮及密壓作用、土壤剪力強度及剪力變形、土壤之夯實。
This course deals with: (1) Origin of soils; (2) Physical properties/indices of soils; (3) Atterberg limits, sieving analysis and classification of soils; (4) Compaction and capillarity of soils; (5) Permeability of soils and seepage problems; (6) Compressibility and consolidation of soils; (7) Shear strength of soils.
schedule:
a.週次  b.單元主題
1~2.    Introduction (1hr); Soil Deposits 　
3.      Soil Classification 　 (Quiz #1)
4.      Soil Compaction
5~6.    Permeability & Seepage
7~8.    Stresses in Soil Mass  (Quiz #2)　
9.      Midterm Exam. 期中考試。　
10~12   Consolidation          (Quiz #3)
13-16   Shear Strength of Soil (Quiz #4)　
17.     Lateral Earth Pressure
18.     Final Exam. 期末考試。
